meanings.definition: Consisting of or characterized by stanzas.
meanings.sent1: The poem had a stanzaic structure, with each section neatly divided.
meanings.sent2: Her stanzaic writing style made the poem easy to follow.
meanings.sent3: The stanzaic format of the song made it perfect for karaoke nights.
meanings.sent4: The stanzaic nature of the painting revealed the artist's meticulous attention to detail.
meanings.sent5: The stanzaic pattern of the quilt created a mesmerizing visual effect.

meanings.definition: Relating to or written in stanzas.
meanings.sent1: The stanzaic structure of the poem added to its beauty.
meanings.sent2: The stanzaic form of the song made it memorable.
meanings.sent3: The stanzaic layout of the book made it easy to read in short bursts.
meanings.sent4: Her stanzaic handwriting resembled elegant calligraphy.
meanings.sent5: The stanzaic arrangement of the flowers in the garden was visually striking.
